title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 500.9 - Percentage of accuracy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 500.9 - Percentage of accuracy

State Regulations

The percentage of accuracy of a meter is the ratio
(expressed in percentage) of its registration in a given time to the actual
amount of water passed through the meter in the same time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
500.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
